original_text: He instituted a festival on the fifteenth day of the eighth month, like the festival held in Judah, and offered sacrifices on the altar. This he did in Bethel, sacrificing to the calves he had made. And at Bethel he also installed priests at the high places he had made.
korean_text: 여덟째 달 곧 그 달 열다섯째 날로 절기를 정하여 유다의 절기와 비슷하게 하고 제단에 올라가되 벧엘에서 그와 같이 행하여 그가 만든 송아지에게 제사를 드렸으며 그가 지은 산당의 제사장을 벧엘에서 세웠더라

sentences.original_text: on the fifteenth day of the eighth month
like the festival held in Judah
and offered sacrifices on the altar
sacrificing to the calves he had made
And at Bethel he also installed priests
at the high places he had made
